item.description:
Join us for the training that everyone is saying they need!

Pinning with a Purpose!

Sue Zimmerman from Computer Companion will be teaching us how to “pin” with a purpose and with an established strategy in place so you don’t end up going down the Pinterest hole wasting valuable time and energy.

She’ll reveal the 8 Pinterest Strategies to drive traffic to your website or blog. You’ll leave having a better understanding of how best to utilize Pinterest to grow your following and business
item.how_to_find_us: Park in the back and look for the balloons!

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: Pinterest Training - Pinning with a Purpose
